gamerule.morphAggroDuration: Aggro Time of nearby mobs when morphed (in ticks)
gamerule.preventLookat: Prevents entities from looking at morphed players.
gamerule.doMorphDrops: Allows entities to drop their morph upon death.
gamerule.allowMorphDeletion: Controls whether to allow players to delete morphs.
gamerule.allowMorphDropping: Controls whether to allow players to drop morphs.
gamerule.allowMorphTools: Setting this to false prevents players from using tools.
gamerule.inheritMorphSpeed: Inherits the speed of the morph.
gamerule.skipSpaceRestrictionCheck: Skips checks which test whether enough space to morph is present or not.
ui.bmorph.not_enough_space: There is not enough space around you to turn into this morph.
